name: Tiny Dino
description:
Inspired by virtual pets from the 90s!

Tiny Dino is a virtual pet game made with retro style visuals in an effort to capture the classic, old school GameBoy vibe!

Gameplay for casual and invested players!

Tiny Dino is designed with different play styles in mind!
Play casually and just relax with your little dino friend. chat with other players in the park and play some games in the arcade!
Or play with long term goals in mind. Raise the dino and get it to lay eggs to hatch or put up in the adoption center!

Your dino has needs that you must fulfill!

Your dino will get hungry, tired and even sick! So be sure to keep track of what's going on or your might end up with an unhappy dino, or even worse, a dead dino!

Customize your dino and its environment!

With over 300 items to customize your dino and it's environment, you can give your dino a style of its own!

A true 8bit soundtrack made to the limits of old school hardware!

Tiny Dino is currently in Beta and some features may not be implemented yet.
Keep an eye out for updates.
